summary: influenza is a major public health issue worldwide. in the seasons 2010–2011 and 2011–2012 the circulation of FLUB was decreasing. we evaluated the clinical presentation, demographic characteristics, admitting department, and length of stay in children who contracted influenza admitted during the 2012–2013 influenza season. our findings suggest a stronger commitment to managing patients affected by FLUA is required. the disease is more severe than FLUB.
